sentences: Meil oli võimas nähtus kui saabusime ookeanile.
context: Ookeani is the Estonian word for 'ocean'. It refers to the vast expanse of salt water that covers most of the Earth's surface. In Estonian, it can be used both specifically to refer to one of Earth's five major oceans (Atlantic, Pacific, Indian, Arctic, Southern) or more generally to any large body of salt water similar to an ocean.
